text: My research work involves applying cutting-edge deep learning techniques to tackle important scientific challenges.

title: University of Oxford, Remote
paper: Detecting COVID-19 Infections from CT Scans Using a Convolutional Neural Network
description: I was responsible for developing a custom CNN using Python and TensorFlow, which successfully achieved an accuracy of 97.3% on a public dataset.
achievement: This paper was entered into the iNSPIRE Competition.

title: Maharashtra Institute of Technology, Aurangabad, India
paper: An Improved Object Tracking and Estimating Using Yolov5 Model Based on Adaptive Kalman Filter and Mixed Precision for Efficient Inference Performance on Surveillance Camera
description: I co-authored a research paper focusing on computer vision and optimization.
status: This paper has been submitted to the Trends in Science Journal and is currently available to read in pre-print.
